Evidence retrieval and synthesis process
Through 2011â€“12, MCA coordinated efforts to review and synthesize the evidence on the 
priority questions. The WHO process included targeted, systematic reviews of relevant 
literature, preparation of GRADE 1 profiles, and analysis of the benefits and risks, values 
and preferences, and costs of implementation.
A literature search of the Cochrane Database and OVID-Medline was conducted in July
